Search under way for missing jetskier on Lake Taupō, witness describes hearing screams https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/search-underway-for-missing-jet-skier-on-lake-taupo-witness-describes-hearing-screams/RXB5AK6GFFF7PN6RFNRXY334CI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/search-underway-for-missing-jet-skier-on-lake-taupo-witness-describes-hearing-screams/RXB5AK6GFFF7PN6RFNRXY334CI/ A man was seen searching with a drone for the missing jetskier. Sun, 19 Jan 2025 06:15:32 +0000 The jetskier is missing on Lake Taupō.
Weather: Wet, windy conditions forecast for Northland, Auckland, Coromandel Peninsula, heavy rain watches issued https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-wet-windy-conditions-forecast-for-northland-auckland-coromandel-peninsula-heavy-rain-watches-issued/JXRL7VZARJHHVMHXJVUT6KCKDY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-wet-windy-conditions-forecast-for-northland-auckland-coromandel-peninsula-heavy-rain-watches-issued/JXRL7VZARJHHVMHXJVUT6KCKDY/ 'Thunderstorms and localised downpours are possible, especially from Monday evening.' Sun, 19 Jan 2025 06:48:14 +0000 Residents at the top of the North Island should pack a raincoat as a wet and windy start to the week has been forecast for the third week of January.
